author: Staff Reporter
text:
The thirtieth All India Ideal Home Exhibition organised by Madurai District Tiny and Small Scale Industries Association (Maditssia) at Tamukkam Grounds is drawing a huge crowd from Madurai and surrounding areas, according to the organisers.

The 10-day exhibition was inaugurated by Collector K. Veera Raghava Rao last Friday. According to V.S. Manimaran, chairman of Maditssia, the crowd-puller in this year’s edition is the Snow World, a small indoor snow park.

“As the temperature is soaring in Madurai even before the onset of summer, the Snow World provides a solace for the visitors, who spend the maximum time there,” he said. The exhibition has a huge pavilion under the theme, ‘Smart City,’ which explains the centuries old history of Madurai while creating awareness of how the city could become a Smart City. “Apart from facilitating a wide range of home appliances available through many stalls, we have also arranged a food court with stalls form 12 leading restaurants in Madurai,” Mr. Manimaran said.

The exhibition is open till Sunday between 4 p.m. to 9 p.m. on weekdays and from 11 a.m. to 9 p.m. on Saturday and Sunday.
title: An ideal getaway
